Class FKBeam

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.fk.obsolete.FKBeam

extends java.lang.Object

      • beamCompute

        public void beamCompute(java.util.ArrayList<FKSeismogram> s,
                        FKParams fkparms,
                        FKResult fkp)
        Given an array of seismograms and FK results, compute the time domain beam
        Parameters:
        s - ArrayList s: list of seismograms and spectra used in the FKAnalysis
        fkparms - FK results object
        fkp - FKResult FK parameters generated by the FK analysis, for this routine the parameters for the fk search are done.

      • averagebeam

        protected double[] averagebeam(double[] tseries,
                               double[] tseries0,
                               int npts,
                               int overlap)
        Parameters:
        tseries - array containing the current beam time series
        tseries0 - start time of the previous beam time series
        npts - number of samples in the beam time series
        overlap - number of samples in the overlap section
        Returns:
        the averaged beam samples.

      • shiftseismogram

        public static void shiftseismogram(double[] seis,
                                   double xrel,
                                   double yrel,
                                   double sx,
                                   double sy,
                                   double[] fc,
                                   int nf,
                                   double df)
        Parameters:
        seis - seismogram time series
        xrel - relative distance (east-west direction)
        yrel - relative distance (north-south direction)
        sx - optimal slowness in the east-west direction
        sy - optinal slowness in the north-south direction
        fc - the fourier coefficents stored as real then imaginary parts in the double array
        nf - number of samples in the frequency domain
        df - sample interval in the frequency domain
